name: LOST (itch)
description:
Find Home

LOST is a short Bitsy game focusing on Pilot_002, as they wake up on a strange ship in a strange universe, putting events together piece by piece as they travel and explore the ship.

The game is available to download and play for free, however donations would be greatly appreciated! The money from this game will help support me to create new, exciting, and more complex Bitsy games!

To find out more feel free to following me on Twitter, Instagram, Tumblr, or check out my Website.

Bitsy is created by Adam Le Doux.
